# Stats 4860 Homework 1

## Question 1: Volume and Surface Area of Sphere

```{r}
sphere_radius <- 4
sphere_volume <- 4/3*pi*sphere_radius^3
sphere_surface_area <- 4*pi*sphere_radius^2

cat("The volume of a sphere with radius 4 is ", sphere_volume, " and the surface area is ", sphere_surface_area)
```

## Question 2: 

### 2.1: Y ~ Binom(10, .3), P(Y=4)

```{r}
n <- 10
p <- .3

q2_y4_binom <- dbinom(4,n,p) #P(Y=4)

cat('P(Y=4) = ', q2_y4_binom)
```

### 2.2: Y ~ Binom(10, .3), P(Y<=5)

```{r}
q2_y_leq_5_binom <- pbinom(5,n,p) #P(Y<=5)

cat('P(Y<=5) = ', q2_y_leq_5_binom)
```

### 2.3: Y ~ Binom(52, .5), P(Y=26)

```{r}
deck_n <- 52
deck_p <- .5

deck_dbinom <- dbinom(26,deck_n, deck_p)

cat('P(Y=26) = ', deck_dbinom)
```

### 2.4: Y ~ Binom(52, .5), P(23 < Y < 28)

```{r}
deck_pbinom <- pbinom(27, deck_n, deck_p) - pbinom(23, deck_n, deck_p)

cat('P(23 < Y < 28) = ', deck_pbinom)
```
